actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Multi-Attack: 2×Claws and 1×Beak Beak [Melee Attack]: 5 (d10) Claw [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6) Bestiary Bestiary 142 142 Hobgoblin TL: 1.4 Medium Cryptid Taller goblins with refined tactical minds from years of combat. HD: 2 (9 HP) Speed: 30' Zone: Frontline Morale: 9 # Appearing: 1 Armor: 2 [as Leather plus Shield] ACTIONS Weapon [Attack]: 3 (d6) or (by Weapon)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Tactical: Targets Save against its attacks as if Vulnerable if at least one of this Being's Allies are within 5 feet of the Target.
